The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar

wikitext.*:
{{book | title=Tolkien Calendar 2000 | image = Tolkien Calendar 2000.jpg | illustrator=[[Ted Nasmith]] | publisher=[[HarperCollins]] | date=[[1999]] | format=Calendar | pages=32 | noisbn=[[Special:BookSources/0-261-10384-9|0-261-10384-9]] (UK)
[[Special:BookSources/0-06-107579-5|0-06-107579-5]] (US) | precededby=[[Tolkien Calendar 1999]] | followedby=[[Tolkien Calendar 2001]] }} The '''''Tolkien Calendar 2000''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] in [[1999]]. It features art by [[Ted Nasmith]] based on ''[[The Silmarillion]]''. ==From the publishers== {{blockquote| The Tolkien millennium calendar includes six paintings by Ted Nasmith from the new edition of The Silmarillion, plus six previously unpublished scenes commissioned especially for this calendar. The Tolkien Calendar has become an established publishing event, eagerly looked forward to by Tolkien fans the world over; there is much demand for the annual calendar, with past calendars becoming collectors' items. This year's continues in the style of the lavish Tolkien Calendar 1999 and is the perfect Christmas gift for lovers of fine fantasy art.}} ==Illustrations== * January - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Beleg is Slain.jpg|Beleg is Slain]]" * February - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Finduilas is Led Past Túrin at the Sack of Nargothrond.jpg|Finduilas is Led Past Túrin at the Sack of Nargothrond]]" * March - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Tuor, Gelmir, and Arminas.jpg|Tuor, Gelmir and Arminas]]" * April - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Beren and Lúthien are Flown to Safety.jpg|Beren and Lúthien are Flown to Safety]]" * May - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Maglor Casts a Silmaril into the Sea.jpg|Maglor Casts a Silmaril]]" * June - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Fingon and Gothmog.jpg|Fingon and Gothmog]]" * Centrefold - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Eärendil Searches Tirion.jpg|Eärendil Searches Tirion]]" * July - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Ulmo Appears before Tuor.jpg|Ulmo Appears Before Tuor]]" * August - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - At Lake Cuiviénen.jpg|At Lake Cuiviénen]]" * September - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Illuin, Lamp of the Valar.jpg|Illuin, Lamp of the Valar]]" * October - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Incoming Sea at the Rainbow Cleft.jpg|The Incomimg Sea at the Rainbow Cleft]]" * November - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Lúthien Escapes the Treehouse.jpg|Lúthien Escapes the Treehouse]]" * December - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Slaying of Glaurung.jpg|The Slaying of Glaurung]]" ==Variants== File:Tolkien Calendar 2000 (Greek).jpg| '''''Τόλκιν Ημερολόγιο 2000'''''
